description: Get the body you Feetve always wanted by integrating the Fitness Circle Pro resistance ring into your fitness regimen Used on the Mat, the Reformer, or other equipment, this portable piece helps maintain proper alignment and increase proprioceptive awareness. Add resistance for upper and lower-body exercisesâ€”the Fitness Circle Pro improves muscle tone and is great for problem areas that are hard to firm up: inner and outer thighs, upper arms and chest. Perfect for either a Pilates instructor or At Home user, this Fitness Circle pro is made of spring steel and built to withstand continuous, high-intensity studio use. Molded latex-free handles overlap the three-band sprung steel ring to provide extra comfort. Inner and outter grips allow for abduction and adduction exercises.
